agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Human Services TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, March 12, 2019 PLACE: E2.030 CHAIR: Rep. James B. Frank The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair. *Public testimony will be limited to three (3) minutes.* HB 288 Thompson, Senfronia Relating to the personal needs allowance for certain Medicaid recipients who are residents of long-term care facilities. HB 342 Cortez | et al. Relating to the period of continuous eligibility for the medical assistance program. HB 459 Hernandez Relating to the placement and use of video recording equipment in certain child-care facilities. HB 1386 Thompson, Senfronia Relating to training and development activities for persons who may interact with an individual with autism or other pervasive developmental disorder. HB 1647 Deshotel | et al. Relating to Medicaid reimbursement for dental services provided to adults with disabilities. HB 1709 González, Mary Relating to the appointment of a surrogate parent for certain children in the conservatorship of the Department of Family and Protective Services. HB 1848 Klick Relating to prevention of communicable diseases in certain long-term care facilities. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
